q: `` That was such a stain on our country,'' he tells ABC News' Diane Sawyer in an interviewed`` I stepped up and told the president I thought I should resign,'' he says. I think probably he and the military and the Pentagon and the country would have been better off if I had. Also during the interview, Donald Rumsfeld defends the Bush administration's war and anti-terrorism records, and his own reputation as a boss who intimidated some of the Pentagon brass.
